conversation.text: I would highly recommend "The Dark Half" (1989). This psychological horror film stars Amy Madigan and Timothy Hutton. The story follows a writer named Daniel Diver who writes a fictional alter ego named The Dark Half. As time passes, the Dark Half becomes more powerful than Daniel himself, leading to a tragic end for both men. "The Dark Half" is a masterpiece of psychological horror that will leave you on the edge of your seat.
